results.title: Metformin protects against pulmonary hypertension-induced right ventricular dysfunction in an age- and sex-specific manner independent of cardiac AMPK.
results.journal: Am J Physiol Heart Circ Physiol
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ protects against @DISEASE_Hypertension_Pulmonary @DISEASE_MESH:D006976 @@@pulmonary hypertension@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Dysfunction_Right</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018497 @@@right ventricular dysfunction@@@ in an age- and sex-specific manner independent of cardiac AMPK.

results.title: Adverse physiologic effects of Western diet on right ventricular structure and function: role of lipid accumulation and metabolic therapy
results.text_hl: We hypothesized that @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ fed a Western diet (WD) would develop RV lipid accumulation and @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Dysfunction_Right</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018497 @@@impaired RV function@@@, which would be ameliorated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.
